metadata.title: CVE-2023-39328 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenJPEG similar to CVE-2019-6988. This flawallows an attacker to bypass existing protections and cause an applicationcrash through a maliciously crafted file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-09-16').
insighttoolkit4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
